ecom-home-home.countdown_title_hd6hog77se9_html: Hurry up! The sale will end on
ecom-home-home.textcontent_w3s3mxsycp_html: Our Herbal and Nutraceutical products are manufactured, tested, and packed under the supervision of Expert technical persons approved by the Government. From the procurement of raw materials to the release of the final product, our technical personnel are involved at all critical levels to ensure the production of a quality product.
ecom-home-home.textcontent_61ek89r28ab_html: Explore Our Exquisite Herbal Capsule Collection.
ecom-home-home.headingtext_z719gbgci98_html: Revitalize Your Body, Mind, and Soul with Herbal.

ecom-product-product.textcontent_vwpyvg1q95i_html:
• WEIGHT MANAGEMENT BY
  • REDUCTION IN FAT ABSORPTION
  • REDUCTION OF CARBOHYDRATE METABOLISM
  • REDUCTION IN APETITE
  • REDUCTION IN CHOLESTEROL LEVEL.
ecom-product-product.headingtext_31nujse946_html: For Maximum Benefits :-
ecom-product-product.textcontent_wyp5kcx535_html:
• Avoid fat containing food like Oil, Ghee, Butter, Junk Food, excessive sugar etc.
  • Before lunch or with lunch consume at least one big bowl of Salad containing Lettuce, Cabbage, Tomato, Cucumber, Sprouts, Radish, Carrot, Corn, Onion, Beans etc. Have at least one to two bowls of green/leafy vegetables in lunch & dinner.
  • Perform exercise daily for 30-45 minutes including brisk Walking/jogging.
  • Initially you can take the dose of two capsules two times a day for 45-60 days & then it can be reduced to maintenance dose of 1 capsule two times a day.
ecom-product-product.textcontent_3fbwgbxef92_html:
• B -SLM Capsules contains important herbs which are used to manage your weight and obesity as mentioned in our old manuscripts since ancient time & supported by Morden Research.
  • Main ingredients/herbs are Kokum, guggul, Musta, Chitrak, Shilajit, Apamarg, Vavding, Arkmul, Pineapple. 
  • These all-time tested herbs work jointly to suppress appetite, decreases. carbohydrate metabolism, reduces Lipid (fat) absorption, reduces serum cholesterol, reduces speed of aging, Hepatoprotective (protects liver). 
  • Thus, B-SLM CAPSULE is a combination of Natural herbs which collectively takes care of fat deposition in body by reducing absorption of fat, Suppresses Appetite, reduces Cholesterol. Thus, It acts to control body weight by managing fat in your body from many directions.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: Commiphora Mukul: - It contains volatile oil, Terpenoids, Flavonoids, Amino acid, Gugu lipid, is responsible for the lipid( Fat) lowering activity of the gugulu, Used since ages.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: It is used as Antioxidant & Rejuvenator. its characteristics as a rasayana. In this context, health benefits such as an increase in longevity, rejuvenating, and arresting aging.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: Achyranthus Aspera: - it reduces lipid(Fat) & used to reduce weight since ages. It has also been reported to have antiarthritic activity.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: Emblica Ribes.:- It helps in reducing lipids including cholesterol and triglycerides. It is also used as antibacterial, lung diseases, heart disease, antioxidant.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_4_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: It contains Bromolain enzyme which helps a lot in weight management.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_5_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: When given to a overweight person, it reduces serum cholesterol.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_6_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: It is used as Antioxidant, Antipyretic, Anti-inflammatory, Anti-obesity as mentioned in our old manuscripts.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_7_ecomcqrf90wkaku_cqrf90: It supresses appetite & thus reduces food intake. It also decreases carbohydrate metabolism.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomsotvngqeza7_sotvng: • B SLM capsule reduces excess fat deposited on body.
ecom-product-product.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomsotvngqeza7_sotvng: • B SLM capsule maintains your body slim and trim
ecom-product-product.textcontent_m9xl992dsx_html: Dosage: For 25 kg or more Additional weight, Initially it can be taken in dose of 2 cap 2 times a day for 45-60 days For additional weight less than 25 kg, 1 capsule 3 times a day for 45-60 days. For maintainance 1 capsule 2 times a day.
ecom-product-product.textcontent_zfi69yeaxt_html: “I think the biggest indicator of how good a company is, is whether or not you'd feel comfortable giving the product to your own family, and I can tell you unequivocally that I feel very confident giving these products to the people I love.”

ecom-preview-home-home.headingtext_tt2knq13uyd_html: Next generation mask with safety technology.
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_f4ctue1s3r_html:
Their ergonomic design and breathable composition make them as ideal fit
for you and your little ones.
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_ex0blbay3xe_html: EComposer anti-pollution masks use 3 layer media filtration technology which blocks even the smallest of particals responsible for air pollution. These mask are made of High quality filter media which blocks PM 2.5 dust, haze,bacterias, influenza viruses etc.
ecom-preview-home-home.countdown_title_rjriovvfsj_html: Hurry up! The sale will end on
ecom-preview-home-home.headingtext_0h12hsk534du_html:
Our masks have a WHO Safety 
Standard Certificate
ecom-preview-home-home.text0_2798e3iml3k_html: Hold the mask by the ear loops or ties, avoiding touching the front of the mask. If your mask has a nose wire, make sure it's at the top and facing inward.
ecom-preview-home-home.text1_2798e3iml3k_html: Place the mask over your nose and mouth, and secure it properly. If your mask has ear loops, gently pull them over your ears. If it has ties, tie them securely behind your head.
ecom-preview-home-home.text2_2798e3iml3k_html: Pick up the mask by the ear loops or ties, avoiding touching the front of the mask. If your mask has a nose wire, make sure it's at the top and facing inward.
ecom-preview-home-home.text3_2798e3iml3k_html: Once the mask is on, adjust it to fit comfortably. Press the nose wire against your nose to mold the mask to your face shape. Pull the bottom of the mask down over your chin.
ecom-preview-home-home.item_title_0_9m4iy5nuosr_html: 01.  Why do I need to wear a face mask?
ecom-preview-home-home.item_title_1_9m4iy5nuosr_html: 02.  How should I dispose of a used medical mask?
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_i7zvzi85lf_html: As of my knowledge cutoff date in 2021, the primary reasons for wearing a face mask are to help prevent the spread of respiratory droplets that may contain infectious particles, such as viruses or bacteria. Face masks are a simple but effective tool in reducing the transmission of respiratory infections, including contagious diseases like COVID-19, as well as other respiratory illnesses such as influenza or the common cold.
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_i5zzpd1qr9_html:
Used medical masks should be disposed of properly to minimize the risk of contamination. They should be discarded in a lined trash bin or a designated medical waste disposal container, according to local regulations and guidelines. 

It's important not to touch the front of the mask when removing it, and to perform hand hygiene immediately after disposal. Used medical masks should not be reused or shared, as they may be contaminated with potentially harmful pathogens.
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_boyylzlr32s_html:
Medical masks can be worn by children, but it's important to consider factors such as mask size, fit, and comfort. Masks should not be worn by children under the age of 2, and children should be supervised while wearing masks to ensure they can breathe comfortably and safely. 

It's important to follow age-appropriate guidelines and recommendations from healthcare authorities for mask use in children.
ecom-preview-home-home.text0_zx9kzjvj62f_html: "The hospital-provided face masks were of excellent quality, with multiple layers and a secure fit. I felt safe and protected wearing them during my visit to the hospital."
ecom-preview-home-home.text1_zx9kzjvj62f_html: "The hospital's face masks were comfortable and breathable, even during extended periods of use. The adjustable nose wire helped create a snug fit, and the ear loops were gentle on my skin."
ecom-preview-home-home.text2_zx9kzjvj62f_html: "The masks were easy to put on and take off, and I felt confident in their effectiveness as an additional preventive measure in the hospital environment."
ecom-preview-home-home.text3_zx9kzjvj62f_html: "As a healthcare worker, I rely on hospital-provided face masks for my daily work. The masks were of good quality, with a high level of filtration and a comfortable fit."
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_no082987h8q_html:
Receive email update stuff you’ll probably want know about including 
products launches & events. Unsubscribe anytime.
ecom-preview-home-home.textcontent_nb7smoor7la_html: © 2022 EComposer All Rights Reserved by The4.
